## Type of change

- [ ] New project entry
- [ ] Update existing project entry
- [ ] Bug fix
- [ ] Feature / improvement
- [ ] Documentation

## Checklist (for new project entries)

- [ ] I created a YAML file in `data/projects/` with the correct slug filename
- [ ] All required fields are filled in
- [ ] `origin.nigerian` is set to `true`
- [ ] At least one of `website`, `demo`, or `repo` is provided
- [ ] `pnpm validate:data` passes locally
- [ ] `pnpm generate:readme` was run and changes are committed
- [ ] `pnpm generate:data` was run and changes are committed
- [ ] The project is real and verifiable
- [ ] I have read and agree to the [Code of Conduct](../CODE_OF_CONDUCT.md)

## Checklist (for code changes)

- [ ] `pnpm lint` passes
- [ ] `pnpm typecheck` passes
- [ ] `pnpm build` passes
- [ ] Changes are tested
